TopicTitle: Turn base style mod idea?Would like some one to create a mod like this.

Articles.Content:
RemoteTech auto launcher
Ever get tired of using Hyperedit?
Want a similar experience but slightly
realistic?

RemoteTech auto launcher is that mod.
It allows to do thos tedious missions like
make a satellite constellation or a Kerhane
scanner or a Scansat mission with out flying thim.
Aka turn based mode.


How it works
In the Vab/SPH it has a new icon towered the bottom right
with a rocket icon.Click that chose the inclination and orbit and chose the any planet or noon.And click launch and time warp a day or two if mission is arround Kerbin and timewarp 4 days if it was a mun Mission etc.
Before you launch you can select the action groups to deplay and auto collect science through the plugin button in the VAB/SPH,

Ps would be cool if some one would make a mod like this.I know one called Routine Mission planner but that is just for space stations around Kerbin to Minmus.Ps happy Saint Patrick's day.
